meaningMnemonic: Do you know みそ Soup and how miso goes in it? This is that miso. It's soft and strange feeling. Now, your <kanji>brain</kanji> <kanji>miso</kanji>, that's your <vocabulary>brains</vocabulary> or your <vocabulary>gray matter</vocabulary>. Essentially, if someone cuts your head open with a katana, this is perhaps what would come out.
readingMnemonic: Reading is just what you learned with the kanji. Just use your 脳 a bit and it should be easy.
